definition: Peer-to-peer payment transactions received by users, specifically VPA to VPA transfers where the payee's Payment Service Provider is SBI
Virtual Payment Address to Virtual Payment Address transactions, representing direct peer-to-peer transfers between UPI addresses
business_alias: P2P Inward Transaction, P2P Inward, VPA to VPA, P2P Transaction

definition: Payment System Provider handling the payee side of the transaction, filtered to 'yes' indicating transactions processed by the primary PSP
business_alias: Payee Payment Service Provider, Payment Service Provider, Payee Payment System Provider

definition: Total count of P2P inward transactions that occurred on the previous day
business_alias: Yesterday's Transactions, Previous Day Transactions, Yesterday Transactions

definition: Total count of P2P inward transactions that occurred on the same day in the previous month
business_alias: Last month same day Transactions, Last Month Same Day Transactions, Prior Month Same Day Transactions

definition: Total count of P2P inward transactions that occurred on the current date
business_alias: Today's Transactions, Current Day Transactions, Today Transactions

definition: Growth rate calculated as (Today's Transactions / Yesterday's Transactions) - 1, showing the percentage change in transaction volume
business_alias: Day-over-Day Growth Rate, Today vs Yesterday Growth Rate, Daily Growth Rate

term: Today vs Last month Same Day
definition: Growth rate calculated as (Today's Transactions / Last Month Same Day Transactions) - 1, showing percentage change from same day last month
business_alias: Monthly Growth Rate, MoM Growth Rate, Month-over-Month Growth Rate

definition: Unique transaction identifier used for counting individual P2P inward transactions
Peer-to-peer payment transactions received by users, specifically VPA to VPA transfers
Payment Service Provider, the financial institution facilitating the transaction
Identifier for the payment service provider receiving the transaction, filtered for HDFC (pthdfc)
Payment Service Provider classification distinguishing between Paytm and other PSPs based on payer handle
